SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Fleming-Rosario Academy?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Fleming-Rosario Academy is arc {Alex Laboratory}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Adriantown College?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Adriantown College is arc {Odonnell Laboratory}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Odonnell Laboratory} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Adriantown College} has the largest input flow.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 36? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {130} from {Odonnell Laboratory} to {Adriantown College}, a flow of {66} from {Adriantown College} to {Odonnell Laboratory}, a flow of {40} from {Fleming-Rosario Academy} to {Adriantown College}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 10? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: No pairs have a flow less than the threshold.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 14 and 22? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {21} from {Alex Laboratory} to {Adriantown College}, a flow of {19} from {Adriantown College} to {Royal Academy}, a flow of {15} from {Royal Academy} to {Adriantown College}, a flow of {14} from {Fleming-Rosario Academy} to {Royal Academy}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Adriantown College to Odonnell Laboratory or from Fleming-Rosario Academy to Adriantown College?
NC.A: The flow from {Adriantown College} to {Odonnell Laboratory} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Adriantown College to Odonnell Laboratory, from Fleming-Rosario Academy to Royal Academy, or from Fleming-Rosario Academy to Adriantown College?
NC.A: The flow from {Adriantown College} to {Odonnell Laboratory} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Odonnell Laboratory}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Adriantown College} and {Odonnell Laboratory}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Fleming-Rosario Academy, Arc Adriantown College, Arc Odonnell Laboratory, Arc Royal Academy, Arc Alex Laboratory}.
